snippet: Initially ruled out during a close play at the plate, Pittsburgh’s Starling Marte was credited with the game-winning run against San Francisco when video showed he beat the tag.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Pittsburgh Pirates beat San Francisco Giants, 2-1, ending Giants' six-game winning streak; other baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Initially ruled out during a close play at the plate, Pittsburgh’s Starling Marte was credited with the game-winning run against San Francisco when video showed he beat the tag.

headline.main: Overturned Call Gives Pirates a Win
headline.print_headline: Overturned Call Gives Pirates a Win
